sentences.sContent: Most of these should be easy to understand if you think in terms of the JVM as a stack-based processor, so I won't go into details here.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most of these should be easy to understand if you think in terms of the JVM as a stack-based processor, so I won't go into details here.
sentences.sCn: 如果将 JVM 想象为基于堆栈的处理器，则其中大多数是容易理解的，因此我在这里就不再详细说明了。

sentences.sContent: In this article I will not go into details on any of the above mentioned tasks, but will concentrate on the game loop alone.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this article I will not go into details on any of the above mentioned tasks, but will concentrate on the game loop alone.
sentences.sCn: 在本文我不会深入前面提到的各种任务的详细实现，而是专注于游戏循环这一点。
